definitions.definition: In a routine manner, in a way that has become common or expected.
Done by rote or habit, as part of a routine, without attention or concern.
examples: We routinely test the fire extinguishers but no one ever expects them to fail.

main_definition: In a routine manner, in a way that has become common or expected.
secondary_definitions: Done by rote or habit, as part of a routine, without attention or concern.
